invention-title.$: Lactam-containing compounds and derivatives thereof as factor xa inhibitors
Lactam-containing compounds and derivatives thereof as factor xa inhibitors
Lactam-containing compounds and derivatives thereof as factor Xa inhibitors

p.$: The present application describes lactam-containing compounds or pharmaceutically acceptable salts thereof. Compounds of the present invention are useful as inhibitors of trypsin-like serine proteases, specifically factor Xa.
